input_text:
Job Title: Cybersecurity GRC Lead

Location: Irving, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description 

TEKsystems is seeking an experienced Cybersecurity Project Manager to join our team.

 Typical Duties Include, But Are Not Limited To 

 Managing the project resources to ensure compliance and alignment with key governance priorities and objectives, as well as ensuring the service aligns with governance expectations. Driving governance activities with familiarity around security controls and access management. Managing the process and resources by which the service, process, policies and controls are documented. Directing the activities of resources to increase the quality and productivity of the service through measurement and monitoring of key metrics -- driving quality improvement by refining service metrics, quality dashboards and analytics; Leading the knowledge management process to support continuing quality improvement. Managing the service quality process with an eye toward lifecycle service management. Leading the communication, promotion and internal marketing activities while helping tracking achievement toward growth objectives such as adoption rates by business unit, division or function. Demonstrating service effectiveness by gauging customer satisfaction, collecting various service statistics and capturing ongoing value to both internal customers and stakeholders. Ensuring maintenance of accurate records and documenting all service activities and discussions.


 Requirements 

 Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration; Cybersecurity or Computer Science; or extensive equivalent experience in an management position. A minimum of 5 years management experience, including experience in enterprise security governance and in identity and access management. Outstanding written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present and communicate with both technical and non-technical audiences Demonstrated experience communicating and presenting at senior executive/director levels (IT Director, VP, CIO, etc.) Broad knowledge of information security (CISM, CRISC, CISSP a plus).


 Skills 

Project Management, Technology Deployment, Cybersecurity, ServiceNow, Data Warehousing, Data Warehouse, Snowflake, Compliance, GRC, ISO27001, NIST

 Top Skills Details 

Project Management,Technology Deployment,Cybersecurity,ServiceNow,Data Warehousing,Data Warehouse,Snowflake,Compliance,GRC,ISO27001,NIST

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

Excellent communication skills

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Demonstrating service effectiveness by gauging customer satisfaction, collecting various service statistics and capturing ongoing value to both internal customers and stakeholders.
Ensuring maintenance of accurate records and documenting all service activities and discussions.
